Responsibilities
Participate in architecture vision and design of our X-Sight SaaS platform
Be a technical authority. Design, document, and enforce best practices
Design and oversee implementation of end-to-end micro-service-based system
Cultivate relationships with business stakeholders and maintain in-depth knowledge of strategic business plans
Educate and support the development teams helping them to resolve complex issues
Define, lead, and execute technology selections and POCs
Requirements
More than 7 years of experience in R&D with at least 2 years in a development architecture position
Extensive hands-on experience with Java, Python
At least 2 years of hands-on experience with AWS and AWS Services. 
Experience in designing high performance, highly available and scalable micro service architecture
Experience architecting/building cloud-based streaming services
Strong design and development experience with docker & K8S
Experience with cloud Big Data tools and platforms such as AWS Redshift, Athena, Snowflake
Experience with Linux environments
Team player and excellent personal skills
Maintain and communicate a big system view
Excellent communication and presentation skills in Hebrew and English
